title: Common Phrases: Life Stages (Usefulness 1-5)
description: Traveler usefulness 1-5/10 phrases for the Life Stages subcategory within Common Phrases. Includes 2 card(s).

cards.english: I turned twenty. I'm an adult now.
cards.japanese: 二十歳です。大人になりました。

cards.english: I became a high school student.
